column6: Booth Description - What's being demonstrated here?  Employees use these descriptions to asses if they should volunteer to staff it

A Success Concierge is a Salesforce Rockstar. Charismatic, knowledgable, and helpful, Success Concierges are tasked with proactively engaging attendees and, based on their needs and interests, directing them to the most relevant experiences in the Product Showcase.
You will be talking all things Foundation! Focus on 1-1-1 Model and direct attendees with product related questions or a request for a demo to the Foundation Zone.

You will showcase how SalesforceIQ can power small businesses with an out-of-the-box CRM solution that is ready in minutes across our large device theater. Sales Cloud customers can also harness the power of Relationship Intelligence with the SalesforceIQ for Sales Cloud apps (Chrome, iOS and Android).
You will be leading demos for SalesforceIQ for Small Business and SalesforceIQ for Sales Cloud.
You will be leading demos for SalesforceIQ for Small Business and SalesforceIQ for Sales Cloud.
You will be leading demos for SalesforceIQ for Small Business and SalesforceIQ for Sales Cloud.
You will be leading demos for SalesforceIQ for Small Business and SalesforceIQ for Sales Cloud.
Demo SalesforceIQ scenarios to the workshop attendees. In the downtime, you'll be the Ask an Expert station.
You are the ambassador of the area and are ensuring that things are running smoothly and that people are there for their shifts.
Demo scenarios that show off how our customers can manage their leads most effectively and grow their pipeline.
Demo how putting marketing tools in the hands of the sales reps lets our customers get more leads and grow their pipeline.
Show how Data.com tools can help our customers get more leads and grow.
Demo how putting marketing tools in the hands of the sales reps lets our customers get more leads and grow their pipeline.
Advise customers on where to go next, depending on how much Salesforce knowledge they possess and what their business goals are.Docents cannot staff this role.
Walk our customers through the great Microsoft integrations we offer and show them how they can accelerate their sales productivity.
Demo all of the great features our customers get with the Sales Console.
Teach customers about the productivity gains they'll get by implementing Territory Management.SE should have a strong understanding of Territory Management functionality.
Show off the Assistant and advanced task management in the new Lightning Experience, and give customers a tour of the productivity gains their reps will get.
Demo to our customers how invaluable it is to keep all of their account & contact records up-to-date and accurate.
Walk our customers through the Opportunity Workspace in the new Lightning Experience and wow them with how they can use it to close more deals.
Demo scenarios that show our customers just how much more business they can close by automating their processes.
Show customers how the new Lightning Experience can help reps, managers, and teams selling more effectively together.
Demo the new, sleeker Dashboards in the Lightning Experience.
Teach customers about how Forecasting will let them make smarter, more insightful decisions.SE should have a strong understanding of Forecasting functionality.
Take customers through a demo of the Sales Wave App to show off our analytics tools.
Demo the new, sleeker Dashboards in the Lightning Experience.
Amaze our attendees with all the ways Sales Cloud helps them sell smarter, faster, and the way they want. Demo the new Lightning Experience, Microsoft tools, Wave analytics, and more.
Lightning Black Belt Training required.Demo the Lightning Experience and Salesforce1 mobile scenarios to the workshop attendees. In the downtime, you'll be the Ask an Expert station.
Marshal the troops and make sure all the booths are staffed, clean, and well-run.

STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Service Cloud SE Specialist ONLY. This demo station will focus on the updated Service Console and how it enables agents to be more productive and deliver fast, accurate answers.  Staffers should be prepared to answer questions about and demo ALL of the Service Cloud features.

STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Service Cloud SE Specialist ONLY. This demo station will focus on the Service Console, including case feed and macros.  Staffers should be prepared to answer questions about and demo ALL of the Service Cloud features.

STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Service Cloud SE Specialist ONLY. This demo station will focus on Omni-Channel Service.  Staffers should be prepared to answer questions about and demo ALL of the Service Cloud features.

STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Service Cloud SE Specialist ONLY. This demo station will focus on all of the Knowledgebase features and how it enables agents to be more productive and deliver fast, accurate answers.  Staffers should also be prepared to answer questions about and demo ALL of the Service Cloud features.

STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Service Cloud SE Specialists or HR/Employee Engagement Blackbelts ONLY. This demo station will focus on the updated Agent Console and how it enables HR to be more productive and deliver fast, accurate answers for employees.  Staffers should be prepared to answer questions about and demo ALL of the Service Cloud features.

STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Service Cloud SE Specialist ONLY. This demo station will focus on Analytics for Service and the new Service Wave.  Staffers should be prepared to answer questions about and demo ALL of the Service Cloud features.

STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Service Cloud SE Specialist ONLY. This demo station will focus on the move from Desk.com to Service Cloud.  Staffers should be prepared to differentiate between Desk and Service and helping customers to identify which is the right fit for their business.

STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Service Cloud SE Specialist ONLY. This demo station will focus on SOS and the new embedded Knowledge features available for mobile apps.  Staffers should also be prepared to answer questions about and demo ALL of the Service Cloud features.

STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Service Cloud SE Specialist ONLY. This demo station will focus on the SOS GA product and how it enables agents to be more productive and deliver fast, accurate answers.  Staffers should be prepared to answer questions about and demo ALL of the Service Cloud features.

STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Service Cloud SE Specialist ONLY. This demo station will focus on Live Agent and how it enables agents to deliver fast, and accurate answers.  Staffers should be prepared to answer questions about and demo ALL of the Service Cloud features.

STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Service Cloud or Marketing Cloud SE Specialists ONLY. This demo station will focus on Service Cloud and Social Hub work together to deliver fast, personalized customer service.  Staffers should also be prepared to answer questions about and demo ALL of the Service Cloud features.

STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Service Cloud SE Specialist ONLY. This demo station will focus on easily creating Service Communities, how they help customers find the right information and deflect calls away from the contact center.  Staffers should be prepared to answer questions about and demo ALL of the Service Cloud features.

STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Members of the Salesforce Customer Service team ONLY. Customer Support Agent resolving real Dreamforce attendee questions/issues from ALL channels (Phone, Email, Twitter, Live Chat, and the new SOS feature). Attendees love to see how real agents use the Service Cloud to answer customer service inquiries!

column5: Technical Support/ SE/CSG (Service Cloud SE or CSG Service Cloud Architect ONLY)
column6: STAFFING REQUIREMENT:  Members of the Salesforce Customer Service, Service Cloud SE Specialists, or Service Cloud Solution Architect teams ONLY.  Service Cloud experts will stand next to Support Agents in the Live Customer Engagement Center resolving real Dreamforce attendee questions/issues.  You will engage with attendees to help them understand what actions Agents are taking to close cases. This allows the agent to focus on closing cases, and YOU to be the expert to answer attendee questions!
Engage attendees, scan badges, give out swag, direct attendees to see a demo or check out the live customer engagement center around the space

column4: Jawbone Service for Apps Demo Presentation
column6: STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Service Cloud SE Specialist ONLY or PMM. This is a "theater style demo" showcasing Connected Devices, Service for Apps, and SOS.  One person will play the role of the agent, while the other will play the role of the customer.  When complete the demo, you will take audience questions.  Staff this booth if you Love presenting and getting folks excited about Service Cloud!!
STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Marketing Cloud SE or product expert only. Journey Builder demo station highlighting current functionality of Journey Builder, Journey Maps and Interaction Canvas.

STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Marketing Cloud SE or product expert only  Journey Builder demo station highlighting current functionality of Journey Builder, Journey Maps and Interaction Canvas. Highlight features that show integration between Sales & Service Cloud
STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Pardot expert only. Pardot demo discussing primary use case of B2B Marketing Automation.
STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Marketing Cloud SE or product expert only. Email demo focused on Email Marketing technology, specifically Content Canvas functionality

STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Marketing Cloud SE or product expert only. Email demo focused on Predictive Intelligence in Email product. The ability to add reference items, predictive items and more into email, while highlight profiles.
STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Marketing Cloud SE or product expert only. Predictive Intelligence on Web & Email, focus on Data & Analytics functionality.
STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Marketing Cloud SE or product expert only. Mobile messaging through MobileConnect (SMS), MobilePush (app push messages), and GroupConnect (Mobile Group Messaging)
STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Marketing Cloud SE or product expert only. Email & Mobile demo, highlighting the use case of coupling Email and Mobile to make a comprehensive strategy
STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Marketing Cloud SE or product expert only. Social Studio demo showing how to listen and analyze on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.
STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Marketing Cloud SE or product expert only. Social Studio demo showing how to publish and engage on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.
STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Marketing Cloud SE or product expert only. Social.com product demo showing how to best use digital advertising budget
STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Marketing Cloud SE or product expert only. Active Audiences demo showing how to create audiences on social and targeting them with relevant digital ads

STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Marketing Cloud SE or product expert only. Marketing Cloud SE or product expert only. Journey Builder demo station highlighting current functionality of Journey Builder, Journey Maps and Interaction Canvas.

STAFFING REQUIREMENT: Marketing Cloud SE or product expert only. Marketing Cloud SE or product expert only. Journey Builder demo station highlighting current functionality of Journey Builder, Journey Maps and Interaction Canvas.

SE will show customers how they can customize and brand our community templates without using any code. SE should have good understanding of Lightning Components as well as good general understanding of Communities.

SE will show customers how they can customize and brand our community templates without using any code. SE should have good understanding of Lightning Components as well as good general understanding of Communities.
HR Blackbelt preferred, but should also have good understanding of general Community and Chatter features.
SE will show customers Salesforce Files and Content, including Files Sync and Files Connect. SE should have a good understanding of Microsoft SharePoint.

SE will show customers how companies can use Customer Communities to drive customer engagement and Self-Service. SE should have good understanding of general communities features as well as Service Cloud Console.

SE will show customers how companies can use Customer Communities to drive customer engagement and Self-Service. SE should have good understanding of general communities features as well as Service Cloud Console.

SE will show customers how companies can use Partner Communities to enable partners through the entire partner lifecycle. SE should have good understanding of traditional PRM as well us alternative uses for Partner Communities.

column4: Hit Your Target with Dynamic Dashboards
column6: Analytics Cloud or Sales Cloud Black Belt Training required. You must be a Sales Engineer - Platform SE to staff this boothPitch the value of Trailhead! Trailhead is the fun and free way for anyone to learn Salesforce. Earn points and badges through interactive, hands-on developer and admin training courses.
